description: Anycubic i3 Mega S - Anycubic FFF 3D Printer

gcode.end_gcode:
G1 E-1.0 F2100 ; retract
G92 E0.0
G1{if max_layer_z < printable_height} Z{z_offset+min(max_layer_z+30, printable_height)}{endif} E-34.0 F720 ; move print head up & retract filament
G4 ; wait
M104 S0 ; turn off temperature
M140 S0 ; turn off heatbed
M107 ; turn off fan
G1 X0 Y105 F3000 ; park print head
M84 ; disable motors

0.4.start_gcode:
G90 ; use absolute coordinates
M83 ; extruder relative mode
M204 S[machine_max_acceleration_extruding] T[machine_max_acceleration_retracting]
M104 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] ; set extruder temp
M140 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single] ; set bed temp
G28 ; home all
G1 Y1.0 Z0.3 F1000 ; move print head up
M190 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single] ; wait for bed temp
M109 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] ; wait for extruder temp
G92 E0.0
; initial load
G1 X205.0 E19 F1000
G1 Y1.6
G1 X5.0 E19 F1000
G92 E0.0
; intro line
G1 Y2.0 Z0.2 F1000
G1 X65.0 E9.0 F1000
G1 X105.0 E12.5 F1000
G92 E0.0
